doc.title: Winning Basketball

credit.role: Himself - Basketball Coach of the Oklahoma A&M Aggies

doc.plot: The sports short features the Oklahoma A&M Aggies (now the Oklahoma State Cowboys)basketball team coached by Hall-of-Famer Henry "Hank" Iba, who were well on their way to winning their 2nd consectutive NCAA championship. It shows the coaching techniques of Coach Iba, some of which are still employed in some fashion by current coaches such as Eddie Sutton at Oklahoma State and Bobby Knight at Texas Tech (courtesy of Indiana U.) and others, and then highlights of the game between the Aggies and DePaul played at New York's Madison Sqaure Garden.
